channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Binance.​US says user funds 'remain safe' amid SEC attempt to freeze assets
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Felix Ng
item.description: The U.S.-based exchange said it's "fully operational" and called the SEC's motion "unwarranted."

item.title: Optimism successfully completes ‘Bedrock’ hard fork, reducing deposit times, layer-1 fees
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The upgrade is part of a series of reforms meant to increase modularity in the OP Stack, allowing developers to spin up their own networks using the software.

item.title: Coinbase reminds world it tried to ‘embrace regulation’ as SEC sues for violations
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Coinbase met with the SEC 30 times in 2022 seeking regulatory guidance and now it will “vigorously defend” itself, it says.

item.title: SEC files motion for restraining order against Binance
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The SEC has accused Binance of mishandling funds and operating an unregistered securities exchange.

item.title: Coinbase CEO responds to SEC suit, says team is ‘confident’ in facts and law
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: In a social media post, Brian Armstrong said he thinks the SEC’s rules are unclear and that the courts need to make rulings to clarify them.

item.title: Crypto traders avoid risk and shelter in stablecoins as the market reaches a turning point
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Nivesh Rustgi
item.description: On-chain data from Glassnode shows market participants averting risk and seeking shelter in stablecoins and BTC as the crypto market nears a decisive move.

item.title: Google Cloud launches free courses to help users build their own GPT-style AI
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: The new corpus includes nine courses and a set of labs that students can complete to earn a Google Cloud skills badge.

item.title: Why is Bitcoin price down today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Kyle White
item.category: why is the crypto market down
is crypto in a bear market
when will bitcoin price go up
item.description: Bitcoin price is down today after lawsuits against Binance and Coinbase led to $106 million in BTC long liquidations.

item.title: Small business lending protocol Defactor tokenizes $100M in bonds
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The bonds are tokenized on Polygon using the ERC-3643 token standard.

item.title: House Ag Committee looks at digital assets regulatory bill, Dems ask how to pay for it
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The full Agriculture Committee heard testimony from CFTC Chair Rostin Behnam, a full roster of former regulators and Coinbase’s chief legal officer.

item.title: Sequoia Capital announces three-way split to separate China business
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: One of the world’s largest venture capital firms, Sequoia Capital will split into U.S./Europe, India/SEA, and Chinese branches.

item.title: Bitcoin price bounces past $26K as Coinbase news fails to shake bulls
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin’s price stages a sudden comeback from its lowest levels since mid-March.

item.title: Why is Ethereum (ETH) price up today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.category: why is ethereum price up today
item.description: Ethereum price is up today, after its absence from the SEC's lawsuit against Coinbase and Binance catch traders' attention.

item.title: Coinbase stock plunges 20% on SEC lawsuit
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The cryptocurrency exchange faces scrutiny from state regulators simultaneous to the SEC litigation.

item.title: 10 industry insiders’ tips for devs who are new to blockchain coding
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Innovation Circle
item.description: If they start in the right place and leverage the many available resources, devs new to blockchain can become thriving community members.

item.title: Breaking: Coinbase targeted by state security regulators concurrent to SEC lawsuit
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The SEC is suing the cryptocurrency exchange for alleged unregistered securities offerings.

item.title: Tornado Cash 2.0: The race to build safe and legal coin mixers
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Max Parasol
item.description: Projects are racing to create legal coin mixers that preserve privacy while revealing just enough data to stay on the right side of the law.

item.title: The Ethereum Shanghai upgrade: Everything you need to know
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tammy Paola
item.description: The Shanghai upgrade allows validators to withdraw the staked ether (ETH) that has been locked in the network.

item.title: Grinding out a living: Can blockchain games really offer a sustainable income?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Stephen Katte
item.description: Blockchain gaming executives believe the law has not yet caught up with the concept of earning a living through gaming.

item.title: SEC sues Coinbase for breaking US securities rules
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The SEC lawsuit alleges that Coinbase operates as an unregistered securities exchange, broker and clearing agency.

item.title: Dev shares how ENS plays a role in decentralized social media
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Makoto Inoue highlighted that Web3 socials are not limited to online platforms but can also be applied offline, keeping records of people’s meetings on the blockchain.

item.title: Binance vs. SEC: Crypto industry debates ‘Tai Chi’ vs. ‘Operation Chokepoint 2.0’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The SEC lawsuit comes just months after the CFTC lawsuit against Binance, mounting its regulatory woes in the United States.

item.title: AI could threaten humanity in 2 years, warns UK AI task force adviser
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: The U.K. prime minister’s AI task force adviser said large AI models would need regulation and control in the next two years to curb major existential risks.

item.title: Binance net outflows hit $778M on Ethereum since SEC charges: Nansen
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The SEC lawsuit against Binance led to outflows of over $750 million on Ethereum in the past 24 hours, with outflows still exceeding inflows.

item.title: 5 YouTube channels for learning graphic design
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Discover a wealth of graphic design knowledge and unleash your creativity with these five YouTube channels.

item.title: Bitcoin traders bet on $24K BTC price as market digests SEC vs. Binance
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin is looking ripe for a trip to its lowest levels since March, say market participants, with BTC price action staying below $26,000.

item.title: Kraken fixes gateway issues after brief delay in withdrawals
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: Major crypto exchange Kraken investigated an issue with crypto funding gateways, including BTC, ETH, and ERC-20, with users experiencing delays in deposits and withdrawals.

item.title: AI should be regulated like medicine and nuclear power: UK Labour Party MP
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: A front-bench member of the United Kingdom’s opposition Labour Party says artificial intelligence should be licensed and regulated similarly to the pharmaceutical and nuclear industries.

item.title: US lawmakers blame crypto firms for ‘tax gap’ in letter to Treasury
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: In a letter addressed to Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen and IRS Commissioner Daniel Werfel, two members of Congress raised concerns about the tax compliance practices in crypto.

item.title: Atomic Wallet hacker sends crypto to mixer used by Lazarus Group: Elliptic
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Martin Young
item.description: Stolen crypto from Atomic Wallet users are already on the move to mixers, according to Elliptic.
